channel.title: Tool Exchange leprachaun
channel.description: So I was looking into UseItem.java, and I saw a use item on npc method, and I was like oh, that'd be good to add a Tool exchange leprachaun, but I don't know how to write it, would it be like if (itemUsed == #### && npcId == ### && slot = ##) { Or something else because I couldn't figure it out last night, got frustrated and well gave up.

item.title: Tool Exchange leprachaun
item.dc:creator: @ezzi ezzi
item.description:
@ezzi wrote:

So I was looking into UseItem.java, and I saw a use item on npc method, and I was like oh, that’d be good to add a Tool exchange leprachaun, but I don’t know how to write it, would it be like if (itemUsed == #### && npcId == ### && slot = ##) {
Or something else because I couldn’t figure it out last night, got frustrated and well gave up.
